ingredients.content: 4 oz white onions, cut into pieces
½ oz canned chipotle chilies, in adobo sauce, minced
31 ½ oz boneless beef chuck roast, partially trimmed of fat, cut into pieces (1 in.)

preparations.content: Place onion, garlic, tomato sauce, chipotle, cumin, paprika, beef stock, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and blend <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>15 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Place Varoma into position, line Varoma dish with a large piece of foil and weigh in beef. Remove Varoma, pour sauce from mixing bowl over beef and close foil to make a parcel.
Place water into mixing bowl, place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>90 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside.

Discard liquid from mixing bowl. Place cooked beef into mixing bowl, insert measuring cup and shred <b>4-8 sec//speed 4<b>. Transfer into a serving dish, garnish with cilantro and serve hot with tortillas, guacamole and salsa.
